sentences.english: There's more to it than fish and chips and a cooked breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 英國傳統飲食可不止是炸魚薯條和英式早餐。

sentences.english: Don't deep-fry fish dough over high heat.
sentences.chinese: 炸魚面時油溫不要太高。

sentences.english: D. Because he hadn't eaten her fried fish at all.
sentences.chinese: 旅行人根本沒喫炸魚，實屬婦女強詞奪理。

sentences.english: Dunno. I was asking what London had to offer apart from fish and chips.
sentences.chinese: 不知道。我是想問，倫敦除了炸魚和薯條還有什麼？

sentences.english: A:I think I'll take fried fish, because fish is one of my favorites.
sentences.chinese: 我想喫炸魚，因爲魚是我最喜歡的。

sentences.english: The slight hot fried fish meatball is very delicious.
sentences.chinese: 稍稍放涼的炸魚球非常好喫。

sentences.english: He’d stop at the chipper on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 回家的路上他會在賣炸魚和炸薯條的店停一下。

sentences.english: The excess fried fish meatball can be stored and used in the next more meals.
sentences.chinese: 喫不完的炸魚球，存放起來可以喫好幾頓。

sentences.english: Get tips for preparing an egg wash to make shallow pan fried fish in this free recipe video.
sentences.chinese: 找一個雞蛋洗準備在這免費食譜影片淺盤炸魚祕訣。

sentences.english: He stuck a piece of fried fish on the fork and put it on the plate.
sentences.chinese: 他用叉子插起一塊炸魚放在了盤子裏。

sentences.english: Eat fish and chips, roast beef, bangers and mash and curry.
sentences.chinese: 炸魚和薯條，烤牛肉，香腸配土豆泥，咖喱。

sentences.english: They had pigs' ears, I had fish and chips.
sentences.chinese: 她們喫豬耳朵，我喫炸魚土豆片。

sentences.english: Can any dish be more English than fish and chips?
sentences.chinese: 有誰敢說自己比英國人更愛喫炸魚和炸薯片？

sentences.english: Fish and chips is John's favourite dish.
sentences.chinese: 炸魚和炸土豆片是約翰最愛喫的東西。

definition: rice in gravy, typically with meat and vegetables
chicken in rice wine/also translated drunken chicken
spicy chicken/(Internet slang) garbage (pun on 垃圾[la1 ji1])
imagawayaki (sweet snack made of batter cooked in the shape of a car wheel, stuffed with azuki bean paste or other fillings)
Sichuan noodles with a spicy and numbing sauce
